name: 伊万·莱萨切克
name_full: 伊万·莱萨切克 Evan Lysacek
birth_place: 美国,伊利诺伊州,芝加哥

last_movies.title: 2006年第20届意大利都灵冬季奥林匹克运动会

introduction: Trivia2005 & 2006 World figure skating bronze medalistHas 1 older sister, Laura & 1 younger sister, Christina.2005 and 2009 U.S. national figure skating bronze medalist.2006 U.S. national figure skating silver medalist2001, 2003 & 2004 World junior figure skating silver medalistWas a member of his high school senior prom courtHas won a medal at every World Championship he has attended (2001, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006).2007 & 2008 U.S. national figure skating champ.Is of Greek descent.2009 Four Continents figure skating silver medalist.2005 and 2007 Four Continents figure skating champion.2008 Four Continents figure skating bronze medalist.2008 Grand Prix final figure skating bronze medalist.2009 figure skating World Champion.2009 world figure skating champion.2010 Olympic figure skating gold medalist.
